name: Tsubame Gaeshi ~Swallow Return~
description:
Tori-san is a samurai-in-training! Guide Tori-san in his swordsmanship as he attempts to cut down other etheral birds in a continuous slash!

Guide Tori-san with the arrow keys and hold shift to slash faster. Q, W and E changes his color. Challenge the ranks in Dojo mode, or relax and play until you drop in Zen mode!

Created for MiniLD 73.

Changelog

1.0.1 (30/04/17)
- Hotfix: Fixed the Restart button, behavior should be normal now
- Removed the Shift for double speed option, default speed is now the old double speed
